L M R S 

L

launch() - Method in class SoundServer
Launches server, which sets up a thread to handle each client.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class SoundClient
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class SoundServer
 

R

run() - Method in class SoundServerThread
Contains the two main loops: One for sender-client handling (SCH) and another receiver-client handling (RCH).

S

SharedFailoverInfo - Class in <Unnamed>
For managing info shared between SoundServerThread instances for managing failover
SharedFailoverInfo(int) - Constructor for class SharedFailoverInfo
 
SoundClient - Class in <Unnamed>
Client that connects to SoundServer.
SoundClient(String) - Constructor for class SoundClient
 
SoundClient(String, int, String) - Constructor for class SoundClient
 
SoundServer - Class in <Unnamed>
A sound server, which lets one client (the first) send and the others receive looping audio from a wav file and fails over to a receiving client if the sending client dies.
SoundServer() - Constructor for class SoundServer
 
SoundServerThread - Class in <Unnamed>
One is started by SoundServer to handle each connecting SoundClient.
